A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
i really hated this film. so many scenes were clumsily executed\, so many tone-death attempts of humour\, so many plot-holes\, a terrible sub-plot. lukes transformation makes no sense. he was an optimistic guy who risked his life because he saw the "light" even in his terrible father. then\, he saw "darkness" in ben solo\, the son of his sister and his best friend\, and was on the verge of executing the child in his sleep... what???
so many missed opportunities\, too. we didn't even get to see luke grief over han solos death.

i'm really sad this movie was made.
